description.narrative: To build capacity of civil society to participate in social protection programming
To gather evidence and learning to inform scale up of the pilot to establish a national system for independent monitoring and contribute to dialogue on affordable and appropriate social protection
To improve the quality and impact of social protection programming in Mozambique by increasing awareness, transparency and participation of citizens in social protection programming
To pilot an independent civil society led monitoring mechanism for social protection programming in Mozambique

participating-org.narrative: FAMOD - Forum das Associacoes Mocambicanas dos Def
Government of the Netherlands - Ministry of Foreig
